articles.title: Iranian-American held in Iran as tensions high following Israeli attack on country, U.S. says - CBS News
articles.description: Reza Valizadeh had worked for Radio Farda, an outlet under Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty that's overseen by the U.S. Agency for Global Media.
articles.content: An Iranian-American journalist who once worked for a U.S. government-funded broadcaster is believed to have been detained by Iran for months now, authorities said Sunday, further raising the stakes a… [+6045 chars]
